title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, July 7
description: This week in politics: maybe just don't use the internet? From Hillary Clinton's emails to Trump's tweets, we'll cover the candidates' online misadventures and more... Including VP speculation, new endorsements, and two tragedies that are putting everything political into perspective. This episode: Host/Campaign Reporter Sam Sanders, White House Correspondent Tamara Keith, Digital Political Reporter Danielle Kurtzleben, and Political Editor Domenico Montanaro. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
